instruction: Read the followingwiki article and provide a short summary.
output: The Ford Mustang is an American car manufactured by Ford Motor Company. It was first released in 1964 and has since become a symbol of American muscle cars. Its classic design has been updated over the years and today the Mustang stands alone as a model of modern performance and style. It is currently offered in several models with various engine and trim options, allowing buyers to customize the Mustang to their own preferences.
